messages.message: @Anil @jack.robbins In the above script, we have not specified if there is any way to copy ground truths from one env to another. Is it feasible? We will need to copy GTs as well so that customer can run accuracy comparison with latest AI runtime and evaluate performance.

Conceptually, Ground Truths feel separate from apps themselves - they live within workspaces and are typically created using a customer’s own documents. It would make sense to have a script to transfer them to reduce manual effort, but that’s probably best handled independently of general app migration.
Do we have APIs to copy GTs? We can update them in our script.
Just reading some earlier comments on the full thread, it seems you want to copy a gt set from one environment to another?
We don't have any APIs that support that, is it feasible to just recreate them on the new environment?
With the same files that were uploaded in previous app runs
Yeah I wanted to check if there is any native API already. If it's not, we could go with the recreate approach.
